name: Pointed Inquiry
flavor_text: Aim for the heart of the matter.

frame.name: High-Impact Frame
frame.description: Slow-firing and high-damage. This weapon is more accurate when stationary and aiming down sights.

perks.description:
Lightly vented barrel.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Arrowhead Brake

perks.description:
Stable barrel attachment.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Chambered Compensator

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Fluted Barrel

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for distance.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Full Bore

perks.description:
Durable ranged barrel.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Hammer-Forged Rifling

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for recoil reduction.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Polygonal Rifling

perks.description:
Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Smallbore

perks.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Extended Mag

perks.description: Faster reloads when the magazine is empty.
perks.name: Alloy Magazine

perks.description:
This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Appended Mag

perks.description:
Rounds cause extra damage to combatants' shields and overpenetrate targets. 
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds

perks.description:
Shots from this weapon knock the target back farther.
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: High-Caliber Rounds

perks.description:
Rounds ricochet off hard surfaces. 
  •  Increases stability 
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Ricochet Rounds

perks.description:
Optimized for fast reloading.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
perks.name: Flared Magwell

perks.description:
Improved reload and range.
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Light Mag

perks.description: Increased accuracy, stability, and handling when firing while crouched.
perks.name: Firmly Planted

perks.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon fills its magazine from reserves. Energy weapons regenerate ammo on hit when matching the damage type to the combatant's shield.
perks.name: Genesis

perks.description: Rapidly landing precision hits will return two rounds to the magazine.
perks.name: Fourth Time's the Charm

perks.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon fills its magazine from reserves, with Kinetic weapons overflowing. Energy weapons regenerate ammo on hit when matching the damage type to the combatant's shield.
perks.name: Genesis

perks.description: Rapidly landing precision hits will return two rounds to the magazine. Increases time between precision shots.
perks.name: Fourth Time's the Charm

perks.description: Grants increased reload speed when close to full magazine.
perks.name: Compulsive Reloader

perks.description: Shooting an ammo brick picks it up and automatically reloads all of your equipped weapons from reserves.
perks.name: Shoot to Loot

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases weapon handling, stability, reload, and range for a moderate duration.
perks.name: Stats for All

perks.description: Grants greatly increased reload speed when close to full magazine.
perks.name: Compulsive Reloader

perks.description: Shooting an ammo brick picks it up and automatically reloads all of your equipped weapons from reserves. Increases range.
perks.name: Shoot to Loot

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases weapon handling, stability, reload, and range for an improved duration.
perks.name: Stats for All

perks.description: This weapon adapts its damage output and effectiveness against energy shields that don't match the weapon's damage type.
perks.name: Adaptive Munitions

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.
perks.name: Demolitionist

perks.description: Precision kills create an elemental damage explosion.
perks.name: Dragonfly

perks.description: This weapon adapts its damage output to be more effective against energy shields that don't match its damage type. Improves damage increase.
perks.name: Adaptive Munitions

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon generate an improved amount of grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.
perks.name: Demolitionist

perks.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield.
perks.name: Turnabout

perks.description: Dealing half of the magazine as precision damage grants this weapon bonus damage. The shot count is reset whenever the weapon is reloaded or stowed.
perks.name: Focused Fury

perks.description: Final blows with other weapons improve this weapon's damage and performance for a short duration.
perks.name: Harmony

perks.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield for an improved duration.
perks.name: Turnabout

perks.description: Dealing half of the magazine as precision damage grants this weapon bonus damage for an improved duration. The shot count is reset whenever the weapon is reloaded or stowed.
perks.name: Focused Fury

perks.description: Final blows with other weapons improve this weapon's damage and performance for an improved duration.
perks.name: Harmony

perks.description: Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output for a short duration.
perks.name: Psychohack
